Member Function Documentation

template<class T, class U>
bool ExtractSubtree< T, U >::extract (  const UPTree< U > &  superTree,
const std::vector< std::string > &  superLookup,
const UPTree< T > &  refTree,
const std::vector< std::string > &  refLookup,
std::string &  otree
) 
 

Removes all leaves from supertree that are not present in reftree and copies the results into otree.

Note that each leaf removal is accompanied by the corresponding edge contraction. It assumed that input trees are numbered from 0 to numleaves-1. The lookup tables are used to access original values.

Parameters:
superTree The supertree to extract from
superLookup Name map for supertree
refTree The tree whose leafset is to be extracted
refLookup Name map for reference tree
otree The output tree in string format
Returns:
true if subtree of supertree with leaf set of reftree is successfully extracted.
